install.name: Custom Code
install.author: Joomlaspan/FijiWebDesign
install.description:
Anything in a Module. You can insert any code (php, html, javascript or css) into the text and show it in the Joomla 1.5 frontend.

More Joomla! 1.5 and 1.0.x extensions are available on Joomlaspan.com

param.name: cache
param.label: Enable Cache
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: custom_code
param.label: Insert Code
param.description: Add any code here. It may be php, html, javascript or css.

param.name: parse_php
param.label: Parse PHP?
param.description: Select Yes if the codes entered above is PHP. If it is not, select No to allow faster module performance.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: js_custcss
param.label: Div CSS codes
param.description: Input any css code that you want here.
